author: Slidebean
description:
Spotify’s Daniel Ek is stepping aside as CEO to become executive chairman; aka the “I’m not fired, I quit” role. Instead of picking a successor, he named two co-CEOs. Ego move? Or just indecisive leadership?

👉 Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up, streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms
title: Spotify’s CEO Shuffle: Two Replacements for One
